other_title: 装甲騎兵ボトムズ 幻影篇 (Japanese)
plot: As a 25th anniversary present to Vanilla and Coconna, Gotho takes them on a tour of the places they spent with Chirico Cuvie from the original series. Along the way, they meet up with old friends, relive their memories, and become involved in a 3000 year old prophecy.
